Caja is the most complete file manager I have used. Its a lot like Thunar, but adds an in-window search function.
summary: The best Linux file manager I have worked with

description: My favorite file manager for Linux , however it doesn't show up on the launch pad in some distributions (Fedora, AntiX, MX, Ubuntu) so you have to launch from the command line.

This is the only sane GNOME file manager, but as noted by others, this app does not show up in the app launcher out of the box (see https://github.com/mate-desktop/caja/issues/1458 ).

A simple workaround is to create your own copy of the app's .desktop file, but with the 'OnlyShowIn=' line removed. To do that, open the Terminal app and run the following two commands:

cp /usr/share/applications/caja-browser.desktop ~/.local/share/applications/
sed -i '/^OnlyShowIn=/d' ~/.local/share/applications/caja-browser.desktop
summary: Really good...after a simple config tweak for GNOME/KDE based distros
This should be the default file manager with gnome

description: It does not work on Fedora 35, then why it's in the software list!!
summary: It does not work on Fedora 35

description:
Ubuntu MATE was my favorite Linux distribution for a long time when I was working on an old and spent laptop, but after my internal HDD has crashed (Android Studio with Gradle on Windows 10 Home was a horrible experience!) and I have installed and switch on to Fedora 35 Workstation on an EXTERNAL HDD, I was simply charmed!

It is beautiful and has very boosted performance on my newly laptop! 🚀

So, I think that Caja will be excellent and lightweight alternative to default Files application presented in Fedora. 👍

Cheers! 🥂
Драган Ћајић
Seit vor gefühlt 100 Jahren Nautilus F3 verlor, suchte ich eine Alternative und fand Caja, no need for futher search.
summary: Der beste Dateimanager in der Linuxhemisphäre

Encore meilleur que Nemo, tous deux forks de nautilus (ancienne et bonne version). Double fenêtre, signets, scripts... Vraiment excellent.
При запуске Перестал отображать флешки и диски, кроме того на котором стоит система. Но после того, как запущу Dolphin, и диски и флешки начинают отображаться.
